fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose another player to bake bread of each night.
- Choose another player to feed bread to each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not bake and feed in the same night.
- The player you feed bread to will gain all the abilities and attributes of the player you baked bread of.
- You can have multiple breads. You can choose which bread to feed to your target, but you may only feed them one bread at once.
